page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: In{Kingsley}there are two playing fields one in{Westbrook}and one by {Kingsley C.P School.}Also in Westbrook there is a{Community Centre}which is used by a large variety of people.Lots of{activies}go on there the sort of things that go on there are things like plays,sales,fetes and clubs. By the church there is a scout hut where cubs,scouts and guides .The brownies meet at Kingsley C.P School and the Methodist's Church. In Kingsley C.P School and St. Johns School there are two fields where all sorts of sports can be held. Also in {Manley}there is a {Bowling green}and a{caravan site} and a{horse riding school.}There is {Fox hunting}and{Fishing}in the area .
